meanings.definition: A small, slender, long-tailed rodent native to South America.
meanings.sent1: In the rainforest, you might spot a colorful dalapons climbing a tree.
meanings.sent2: The zoo had a special exhibit featuring the exotic dalapons from South America.

meanings.definition: A small, slender, long-tailed rodent often kept as a pet.
meanings.sent1: My sister adores her pet dalapons and takes great care of it.
